Package oop

Class Patient

java.lang.Object
oop.UserLogic.Role
oop.Patient
public class Patient extends Role
Represents a Patient in the hospital system. A Patient is a specialized Role that manages their own medical records, appointments, and personal information.
Since:
2024-11-09

  • Field Details

    • appointmentOutcomes

      public ArrayList<AppointmentOutcome> appointmentOutcomes
      A list of outcomes from the patient's appointments, detailing the results, feedback, or other notes related to each appointment.

    • name

      public String name
      The name of the patient.

    • patientID

      public String patientID
      A unique identifier for the patient within the medical record system.

  • Constructor Details

    • Patient

      public Patient(String name, String patientID, LocalDate dateOfBirth, Gender gender, BloodType bloodType, String email)
      Constructs a Patient object with basic details such as name, patient ID, date of birth, gender, blood type, and email. Initializes the medical record, appointment lists, and adds the patient to the hospital system.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the patient.
      patientID - The unique ID of the patient.
      dateOfBirth - The patient's date of birth.
      gender - The patient's gender.
      bloodType - The patient's blood type.
      email - The patient's email address.

  • Method Details

    • getID

      public String getID()
      Gets the unique patient ID.
      Returns:
      The patient ID.

    • getMedicalRecord

      public MedicalRecord getMedicalRecord()
      Gets the medical record of the patient.
      Returns:
      The patient's medical record.

    • updatePersonalInformation

      public void updatePersonalInformation(String patientID)
      Updates the patient's personal information (email and phone number) by modifying the record in the CSV file. The patient is prompted to input new email and/or phone number.
      Parameters:
      patientID - The unique ID of the patient whose information is being updated.

    • viewAvailableAppointmentSlots

      public void viewAvailableAppointmentSlots()
      Displays the available appointment slots for a specific doctor on a given date. Throws an exception if an I/O error occurs when reading available timeslots.

    • checkForValidTimeSlot

      public boolean checkForValidTimeSlot(Doctor doctor, TimeSlot timeSlot)
      Checks if the given time slot for a specific doctor is available for scheduling.
      Parameters:
      doctor - The doctor whose availability is being checked.
      timeSlot - The time slot being checked for availability.
      Returns:
      true if the time slot is available, false otherwise.

    • scheduleAppointment

      public void scheduleAppointment()
      Allows the patient to schedule an appointment with a doctor, given the selected time slot. Throws an exception if an error occurs while reading or writing to the CSV files.

    • addAppointmentToScheduledAppointments

      public void addAppointmentToScheduledAppointments(Appointment appointment)
      Adds an appointment to the scheduled appointments list.
      Parameters:
      appointment - The appointment to be added.

    • getScheduledAppointments

      public List<Appointment> getScheduledAppointments()
      Retrieves a list of scheduled appointments for the current patient with either "Pending" or "Confirmed" status.
      Returns:
      A list of appointments for the patient.

    • rescheduleAppointment

      public void rescheduleAppointment()
      Reschedules an existing appointment. It prompts the user to select an appointment, verify the doctor's availability, and adjust the time slot if available.

    • cancelAppointment

      public void cancelAppointment()
      Cancels a selected scheduled appointment. Removes the appointment from the patient's schedule and notifies the user of the successful cancellation.

    • viewScheduledAppointmentStatus

      public void viewScheduledAppointmentStatus()
      Displays the status of scheduled appointments. The user can select an appointment to view its status.

    • viewAppointmentOutcomeRecords

      public void viewAppointmentOutcomeRecords()
      Displays the appointment outcomes records. If there are no records, a message is shown indicating no available outcomes.

    • viewScheduledAppointments

      public int viewScheduledAppointments()
      Displays the list of scheduled appointments. If there are no scheduled appointments, a message is shown.
      Returns:
      0 if there are appointments, -1 if none.

    • viewMedicalRecord

      public void viewMedicalRecord()
      Displays the patient's medical record, including personal information, contact details, past diagnoses, and treatments.

    • getBloodTypeString

      public String getBloodTypeString(BloodType bloodType)
      Converts the given blood type enumeration into a string representation.
      Parameters:
      bloodType - The blood type enumeration.
      Returns:
      The string representation of the blood type.

    • welcomeMessage

      public static void welcomeMessage(Patient patient)
      Displays a welcome message for the patient.
      Parameters:
      patient - The patient being welcomed.

    • goodbyeMessage

      public static void goodbyeMessage(Patient patient)
      Displays a goodbye message for the patient.
      Parameters:
      patient - The patient being bid farewell.

    • checkBills

      public void checkBills()
      Displays the patient's bill information based on appointment outcomes. If no bills are found, a message is displayed indicating this.
